subtitle: The Journey of AeroTracker
foundingContent: AeroTracker was founded in 2020 by a team of aviation enthusiasts and technology experts with a shared vision: to create the most comprehensive and user-friendly flight tracking platform in the world. What began as a passion project in a small garage has grown into a global service trusted by millions of users.

2020.title: 2020: Taking Flight
2020.content: AeroTracker launches with basic flight tracking capabilities, covering major airlines and airports in North America.

2021.title: 2021: Expanding Horizons
2021.content: Global coverage expanded to include Europe, Asia, and Australia. Mobile applications for iOS and Android released.

2022.title: 2022: Technological Advancements
2022.content: Implementation of real-time weather overlays, aircraft details, and enhanced mapping features. Launch of subscription service.

2023.title: 2023: Community Growth
2023.content: Reached 1 million active users. Introduced social features allowing users to share flight information and experiences.

2024.title: 2024: Data Revolution
2024.content: Integration with multiple data sources for unprecedented accuracy. Introduction of AI-powered predictions for delays and optimal routes.

2025.title: 2025: New Heights
2025.content: Complete platform redesign with enhanced user experience. Launch of enterprise solutions for aviation professionals and businesses.

missionContent: At AeroTracker, our mission is to make accurate flight information accessible to everyone. We strive to provide the most reliable, up-to-date, and comprehensive aviation data while maintaining an intuitive user experience.
visionContent: We envision a world where travelers, aviation enthusiasts, and industry professionals have seamless access to real-time flight information. By combining cutting-edge technology with our passion for aviation, we aim to become the global standard for flight tracking by 2030.

accuracy.title: Accuracy
accuracy.content: We are committed to providing the most precise and reliable flight information possible.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.content: We continuously explore new technologies and approaches to improve our service.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.content: We believe flight information should be easy to understand and available to everyone.

community.title: Community
community.content: We foster a global community of aviation enthusiasts and professionals.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.content: We respect and protect user data with the highest standards of security.

partnersContent: We collaborate with leading airlines, airports, and aviation organizations worldwide to ensure the highest quality of data and service.
